title: Oil giant Shell wins appeal against landmark Dutch climate ruling to slash emissions
content: A Dutch court on Tuesday ruled to dismiss a landmark climate ruling against Shell, which had ordered the firm to drastically reduce its global carbon emissions.
summary: A Dutch court on Tuesday ruled to dismiss a landmark climate ruling against Shell, which had ordered the firm to drastically reduce its global carbon emissions.
